Class AssignPaymentsToBillFlowController

public without sharing class AssignPaymentsToBillFlowController

Apex controller for flow Assign Payments to Bill. Refreshes the bill manual calculated fields.

Change History

07/19/2021 Initial version.

public static void
refreshBillCalculations(List<String> billIds)
Refreshes the manual calculated fields for the given bills.

Methods

Refreshes the manual calculated fields for the given bills.
